ComicInfo.Title: Beware the Coming of... Infinitus! or How Can You Stop the Reincarnated Man?
ComicInfo.Summary: Beware the Coming of... Infinitus! or How Can You Stop the Reincarnated Man?: Johnny and Tony try to work together to stop a man from killing his brother.
